title: Design and Implementation of Open Badge Learning Guidelines

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: PBL course operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with formative assessment-driven feedback mechanisms.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core components of open badges: goals, methods, media, and assessment
Learners can apply the open badge learning activity design process based on the ASSURE model
Learners can generate open badge project outputs using smartphone-based tools
Learners can simulate the expert consensus-building process using the fuzzy Delphi technique
Learners can propose strategies for utilizing open badges in digital language learning contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
